t_adc_convert_param Struct Reference


Data Fields

unsigned short result [16]
t_channel channel

Detailed Description

This structure is used with IOCTL code IMX_ADC_CONVERT, IMX_ADC_CONVERT_8X and IMX_ADC_CONVERT_MULTICHANNEL.

This structure is used with IOCTL code PMIC_ADC_CONVERT, PMIC_ADC_CONVERT_8X and PMIC_ADC_CONVERT_MULTICHANNEL.

Field Documentation

t_channel channel

channel or channels to be sampled.

unsigned short result

holds up to 16 sampling results
